required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety/Tolerability/Pharmacokinetic (PK)/Pharmacodynamics (PD) Study of BMN701 in Patients With Late-Onset Pompe Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1/2 Open-label Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamic and Preliminary Efficacy of BMN 701 (GILT-tagged Recombinant Human GAA) in Patients With Late-onset Pompe Disease

brief_summary.textblock: A Phase 1/2, open-label, multicenter, multiple dose escalation study of BMN 701 administered by intravenous infusion every 2 weeks over a 24-week treatment period to patients with late-onset Pompe disease.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Six Minutes Walk Test
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Six Minutes Walk Test. The 6MWT measured the maximum distance the subject could walk on a flat, hard surface in a period of 6 minutes

other_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Forced Vital Capacity
other_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Forced Vital Capacity. Changes in respiratory function were assessed by measurement of MEP, MIP and MVV; and percent predicted upright and supine FVC.

other_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Percent Predicted Supine Forced Vital Capacity
other_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Percent Predicted Supine Forced Vital Capacity. Changes in respiratory function were assessed by measurement of MEP, MIP and MVV; and percent predicted upright and supine FVC.

other_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Maximum Expiratory Pressure
other_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Maximum Expiratory Pressure. Changes in respiratory function were assessed by measurement of MEP, MIP and MVV; and percent predicted upright and supine FVC.

other_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Maximum Inspiratory Pressure
other_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Maximum Inspiratory Pressure. Changes in respiratory function were assessed by measurement of MEP, MIP and MVV; and percent predicted upright and supine FVC.

other_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Upright Maximum Ventilatory Volume
other_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Upright Maximum Ventilatory Volume. Changes in respiratory function were assessed by measurement of MEP, MIP and MVV; and percent predicted upright and supine FVC.

Hôpital de I´Archet- Centre Hospitalier Universitaire Nice
Old Queen Elizabeth Hospital, Department of Medicine

class.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Number of Participants With Adverse Events

measure.title: Number of Participants With Adverse Events

outcome.title: Change From Baseline in Six Minutes Walk Test
outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Six Minutes Walk Test. The 6MWT measured the maximum distance the subject could walk on a flat, hard surface in a period of 6 minutes
outcome.population: ITT Population. As some patients did not attend or all tests were not completed at each visit, some time points had different numbers of patients analyzed. The total number of patients analyzed for each arm is listed as the maximum patients analyzed at any given time point.

outcome.title: Change From Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Maximum Expiratory Pressure
outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Percent Predicted Upright Maximum Expiratory Pressure. Changes in respiratory function were assessed by measurement of MEP, MIP and MVV; and percent predicted upright and supine FVC.
outcome.population: ITT Population. As some patients did not attend or all tests were not completed at each visit, some time points had different numbers of patients analyzed. The total number of patients analyzed for each arm is listed as the maximum patients analyzed at any given time point. No patient had baseline assessment in group of BMN 701 5 mg/kg.

reported_events.time_frame: 32 weeks (27 days of screening and baseline measurements + 24 weeks of treatment + 20 days of follow-up)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
